resources.string: Please restart the app after giving permission.
It is used to detect the startup of terminal.
■ The date and time are displayed in the center of the status bar.

■ ① Display the "Accessibility Service" setting screen.\n・Turn this on if the display does not resume when the terminal starts up or wakes up from sleep. \n・In this app, accessibility is only used to detect device startup.
① Display the accessibility service setting screen

■ ② Displays the battery optimization setting screen. (Android 6.0 or higher) \n・If the accessibility service of ① is forcibly turned off when the terminal sleeps, it may not be turned off without optimizing the battery. \n・Depending on the terminal, there may be other settings to prevent it from being forcibly turned off.
② Display the battery optimization setting screen

■ Turn on/off the status bar icon displayed by the OS. (Android 6.0 or higher) \n・There is a possibility that the time display on the original status bar can be turned off. \n・This is a hidden function in general, so it does not work on all terminals.
Display System UI setting tool screen

■ Display the notification setting screen of the app. \n・You can turn off notifications if you find it annoying to hear a message in the notification area or the notification sound when this app starts displaying.
Display the notification setting screen of the app
Tap to display the initial screen
